page.title: 03Marsh Green
page.content: Marsh Green is a village without a shop,church or school.It used to have all of these and a post office but they are all closed down now.Most of them have been converted into houses.Also there used to be a Smithy.The old school was not in Marsh Green but was at a crossroads just outside the village and served several smaller places as well.It is now a Bingo Hall and voting place.Marsh Green goes back quite a long way as there is a house in the village which is about 500 years old.Also a memorial in the centre of the village names people who died in both World Wars and some of the same familys still live in the village.There is one farm in Marsh Green and most of the surrounding area is farmland.Some of
